content:
Yes, **Wholesale Computers & Technology, Inc.** (WCAT) operates both the eBay store under the username "wholesalebroker" and the website [wcatinc.com](https://wcatinc.com). Their physical address is **5784 Powerline Rd, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33309**, which is approximately **12 miles from Pompano Beach**. citeturn0search14

**Contact Information:**
- **Phone:** (954) 633-5353
- **Website:** [wcatinc.com](https://wcatinc.com)
- **eBay Store:** [wholesalebroker](https://www.ebay.com/str/wholesalebroker)

**Recommendations:**
- **Local Pickup:** Given your proximity, you might consider visiting their Fort Lauderdale location to inspect and purchase the laptop directly, potentially expediting your acquisition.
- **Contact Ahead:** It's advisable to call ahead to confirm product availability and inquire about the possibility of immediate pickup.

By engaging directly with WCAT, you can streamline the purchasing process and ensure the laptop meets your specifications.
